isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - ANTILOCK AIR BRAKE SYSTEM WITH TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - 9200, 9300 and 9400 - TROUBLESHOOTING - TESTING FOR FALSE INDICATION CAUSED BY ABS WARNING LIGHT

title.hotlnk: TESTING FOR FALSE INDICATION CAUSED BY ABS WARNING LIGHT

svcproc.para: This test should be performed if:

item.para: The ABS Warning Light on the instrument panel remains ON.
There are no Red LEDs ON.
The Green VLT LED is ON but not flashing.

figure.caption: Figure 46. Testing for False Indication Caused by ABS Warning Light

para.hotlnk: Testing for False Indication Caused by ABS Warning Light (Continued)

figure.caption: Figure 47. Testing for False Indication Caused by ABS Warning Light (Continued)
